programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E21, In June 1985, a 20-year-old "Sucker Day" Festival Queen is found brutalized. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is on the hands of a local wealthy businessman, but after 25 years DNA reveals the true killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Officer Down
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E06, The longest-running cold case of a law enforcement officer in the United States was the murder of Sheriff's Lt. Joe Clark.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Secret Agent Super Dragon
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Secret Agent Super Dragon, S05E04, A secret agent tries to stop a drug lord from taking over the world with hallucinogenic chewing gum.

programme.title: Warrior Of The Lost World
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior Of The Lost World, S06E01, A nameless hero and his talking motorcycle fight an evil dictator in a post-apocalyptic world.

programme.title: The Starfighters
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Starfighters, S06E12, An Air Force pilot attempts to gain the respect of his father.

MST3K: Racket Girls, 19700101000000 +0000, A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.
MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians, 19911221000000 +0000, Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II, 19911116000000 +0000, Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.

programme.title: Red Zone Cuba
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Red Zone Cuba, S06E19, An escaped convict and his two pals take part in the Bay of Pigs invasion, then return home with a plan to get rich.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Out Of This World
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E22, It's Heaven vs. Hell in this short. Plus: bread?

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Days Of Our Years
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E23, Stay safe with this informative short about occupational hazards.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Undersea Kingdom - Chapter 2: The Undersea City
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E15, The second installment of the undersea adventure to Atlantis.

Wedding Planner Mystery, 20141019000000 +0000, A young wedding planner is framed for a crime and struggles to clear her name as she learns that love does not always arrive in a pretty package. Stars Erica Durance, Andrew Walker and Brandon Beemer.

To Dance with the White Dog, 19931205000000 +0000, An unusual love story in which a strange white dog appears and helps Sam Peek, a Georgia tree farmer, cope with the loss of his wife, Cora. Stars Hume Cronyn and Jessica Tandy. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
Three Weeks, Three Kids, 20110101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Jennifer's life is turned around when she must take care of her sister's kids.

The Water is Wide, 20060129000000 +0000, During the late 1960s, a novice schoolteacher comes to a small island off the coast of South Carolina with the hope of bringing literacy and self-respect to the undereducated, African-American children living there.

The Wedding March, 20160625000000 +0000, After two decades apart, college sweethearts Olivia and Mick are reunited when Mick is booked as the singer at Olivia's wedding to another man. Stars Jack Wagner, Emily Tennant and Josie Bissett.

The Memory Book, 20140726000000 +0000, At a flea market, Chloe discovers a book of photos showcasing the romance of a young couple from the early seventies. She sets out on a literal and emotional journey to find the happy couple she knows only through photos.

The Makeover, 20130127000000 +0000, Hannah Higgins--a smart, driven Harvard-educated professor--attempts to turn blue-collar Boston beer vendor Elliot Doolittle into a viable candidate for Congress and inadvertently learns something of Elliot's side of life.

The Santa Suit, 20101202000000 +0000, Drake Hunter (Kevin Sorbo), the president of Hunter Marketing, has the perfect plan to boost sales for his father's toy company over the holiday season—hire department store Santas to promote his father's merchandise.

A Dog Named Christmas, 20091129000000 +0000, A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.

All Saints Christmas, 20221106000000 +0000, When the media mistakes a photo of Lisette, a popular singer who's getting ready to travel home for Christmas, with her ex as an engagement announcement, her family insists that he join her on the trip.

programme.title: Progeny
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E05, Dr. McKay discovers a reference to an abandoned Ancient testing site. At the site, the team discovers a vast metropolis supporting millions of Ancients. Eager to create an alliance, Weir is shocked when their leader Oberoth refuses the offer.

programme.title: The Real World
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E06, Waking up in a psychiatric hospital outside of D.C., Weir is shocked to discover that her entire experience in Atlantis over the last two years was all in her imagination. She learns that a car accident left her suffering from delusional psychosis.

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E11, An alien vessel appears in Destiny’s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isn’t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E12, Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ship’s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E13, Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: The Broca Divide
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E05, Returning from a planet with both a civilized and primitive side, all but two of the team become infected and spread a brutal virus. Will Teal'c and Jackson find the cause, or are their colleagues doomed to become Stone Age primitives?

programme.title: The First Commandment
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E06, The SG-1 team is sent after the SG-9 team that has failed to return. They find that the team's captain (William Russ), having been treated like a god by planetary inhabitants, is drunk with power and is tyrannizing them. Can they overcome him?

programme.title: Cold Lazarus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E07, A strange crystal strikes down O'Neill, replacing him with a double that returns with the team to Earth to find the cause of O'Neill's private grief...his son's death. But the double is dangerously unstable. Can O'Neill return home to save everyone?

programme.title: The Nox
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E08, When a planned ambush goes disastrously wrong, resulting in fatalities among the SG-1 team, the peace-loving Nox restore them to life. But while these gentle people can bring back the dead, can they resist the deadly technology of the Goa'uld?

programme.title: Brief Candle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E09, On the mysterious planet Argos, the beautiful Kynthia seduces Colonel Jack O'Neill, which means he's condemned to an Argosian lifespan of only a hundred days. As he turns gray, will his team succeed in their frantic search for a cure?

programme.title: Thor's Hammer
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E10, Looking for allies against the Goa'uld, the SG-1 team lands on Cimmeria, home of the legendary Norse gods. Teal'c and O'Neill are transported to an underground labyrinth of caves of the vicious creature Unas. Can Carter & Daniel rescue them?

programme.title: The Torment Of Tantalus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E11, Dr. Daniel Jackson discovers that in 1945, a young professor slipped through the Stargate, never to return. Together with his still living fiancée, the SG-1 team discovers the now aged professor trapped in a decaying fortress.

programme.title: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E12, With the proviso that he bring back a Goa'uld larva for study, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns to Chulak to stop the Goa'uld from enslaving his son Rya'c. Trouble is, Rya'c needs a larva to survive - and the only one available is Teal'c's.

programme.title: Fire And Water
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E13, The SG-1 team returns from the planet Oannes in a panic and minus Daniel Jackson, who was last seen being consumed by a column of flames. But as his comrades mourn him on Earth, Daniel is the captive of an amphibious humanoid creature known as Nem.

programme.title: Hathor
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E14, The evil Goa'uld Hathor (Suanne Braun) escapes from a Mayan pyramid in Mexico. At the Stargate facility, she uses her charms to seduce the men into helping her take over the world. Can Samantha Carter and her female colleagues defeat her?

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E15, Capt. Carter returns with the sole survivor of a planetary plague - a little girl, Cassandra. As they become attached, Carter discovers the girl's terrible secret - a time bomb implanted by the Goa'uld. Can she save the girl - and the world?

programme.title: Parental Guidance Recommended
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E020, Suspicions arise over Jack's handling of Dylan's trust fund. David is offered a deal by a music label but is pressured to fire Steve as his manager.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E021, Jack and Dylan begin a new life together, living aboard a yacht with Dylan's enormous trust fund at their disposal. On the surface, everything seems perfect, but Jack has some dangerous enemies.

programme.title: The Child is the Father to the Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E022, After Dylan accepts an invitation to stay at the Walsh home, he finds that old demons have returned to haunt him

programme.title: Duke's Bad Boy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E023, Brandon's gambling spins out of control. Donna feels that David's new record label is running his music.

programme.title: Perfectly Perfect
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E024, Kelly's obsession with her weight turns dangerous. Brandon and Steve vie for the same girl's attention on a television game show.

programme.title: Senior Poll
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E025, The results of the Senior Poll are in, leading some to question whether it is exclusionary.

programme.title: She Came in Through the Bathroom Window
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E026, Senior Ditch-School day proves memorable as thieves prey upon the gang at an amusement park and then Peach Pit.

programme.title: A Night To Remember
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E027, The students of West Beverly are horrified to learn that the school board has pushed through a measure that will bar any student found drunk at the prom from graduation.

programme.title: Something in the Air
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E028, The group rallies around Donna after the school board rules that she cannot participate in graduation ceremonies because of her drunkenness at the prom.

programme.title: Commencement Part 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E029, As graduation approaches, the teens of West Beverly make their final decisions about the future while reminiscing about the past.

programme.title: So Long, Auf Wiedersehen
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E001, The gang kicks off college with a huge party. Brenda is uncertain about her decision. Andrea learns hurtful information about Gil.

programme.title: The Girl From New York City
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E002, Brandon's new girlfriend has intimacy issues and Brenda has trouble at school.

programme.title: The Little Fish
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E003, Brenda arrives back in Beverly Hills in the middle of the night and Steve's scheming ways almost backfire as the gang decides which classes to take.

programme.title: Greek To Me
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E004, It is rush week on campus. Now on the staff of the campus radio station, David and Donna man the graveyard shift.

programme.title: Radio Daze
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E005, Dylan finds Kelly with another guy. Donna is offered a daytime slot at the radio station, which causes problems with David. Andrea plans a date with her English teacher.

programme.title: Strangers in the Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E006, Kelly recommends that she and Dylan see other people. Mr. Walsh sets Brenda up on a blind date with his client's son.

programme.title: Player Down/Dad’s Baby
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E181, A lineman suffers cardiac arrest and collapses on the football field. A dad has to deliver third baby.

programme.title: ATV 5 Yr Old/Honeybee Horror
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E371, A 5-year old boy tries to drive a four-wheel ATV and loses control. A man mowing disturbs a nest of 4,000 bees.

programme.title: Drainage Ditch/Co-Poison Family
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E211, Two 10-year-olds take a short cut home across a drainage ditch, which suddenly fills with water. A family suffers from carbon monoxide poisoning.

programme.title: BVI Dinghy/Silent Intruder
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E326, A rough wave capsizes a family's small dinghy while snorkeling. A woman finds an intruder inside her home.

programme.title: Helicopter Horse/Kids in Smoke
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E251, A horse loses its footing and throws a rider off 300 feet down onto a ledge. A 12-year-old babysitter notices black smoke.

programme.title: Fatal Attract/Philly Docu

programme.title: Blacked-Out Driver/Self Inflicted
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E158, 911 dispatcher tries to talk woman with a loaded pistol out of committing suicide

programme.title: Applebee’s Hostage/Locomotive Cop
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E357, A masked gunman demands money from a restaurant manager. A cop tries to help a boy trapped in a car stalled on train tracks.

programme.title: Killing Plane/Teen Car, Part 1

Under the Christmas Tree, 20241227130000 +0000, Romantic sparks fly between Alma and Charlie when Charlie finds the perfect tree for the Maine governor's holiday celebration right in Alma's backyard.

programme.title: Armored Car
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E13, Jill teams up with Trevor to win a beach volleyball tournament, but all she really wants is to beat her former lover's team. Eddie and Shauni team up to rescue a young girl trapped in an armored car that topples off the pier into the ocean.

programme.title: Home Cort
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E14, Mitch gets a surprise visit from his old, mischievous Navy S.E.A.L. buddy and ex-Baywatch lifeguard, John Cort, adding serious problems in their already complicated relationship. And Shauni and Jill fight a battle of the sexes against a shady vendor.

programme.title: We Need a Vacation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E15, Craig, Cort, and Eddie take a road trip to Mexico, but their vacation south of the border turns ugly when they tangle with an angry American tourist. Meanwhile, Captian Thorpe becomes Mitch's uninvited house guest. Hobie develops a crush on Shauni.

programme.title: Muddy Waters
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E16, Cort and Eddie train lifeguards at a water park, but someone is vandalizing the waterslides, putting people's lives in danger. Meanwhile, Captain Thorpe wants Shauni fired for posing in a provocative calendar.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E17, Eddie and Cort happen upon an illegal gambling ship. Meanwhile, Mitch begins to spend more time with Hobie's English teacher – a liaison that embarrasses Hobie beyond belief.

programme.title: Eclipse
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E18, After losing his rookie partner in the mysterious rescue of what he thinks is a ghost, Eddie gets unwittingly caught up in a 70-year-old legend. Meanwhile, Hobie attempts to help a friend find a new home for her dog.

programme.title: Shark Derby
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E19, A local restaurateur puts up a $25,000 bounty for the largest shark caught during the weekend's Shark Derby he's sponsoring. To attract more sharks, he illegally chums the waters, drawing hundreds of sharks uncommonly close to shore.

programme.title: The Big Race
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E20, Cort promises to come up with $10,000 for a nursing home, but he needs Mitch and Craig's help to compete in a water-skiing race with a big cash prize. Shauni’s traumatic fear of the ocean after Jill’s death threatens her future with Baywatch.

programme.title: Old Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E21, Craig, Mitch, and Garner go for a weekend hang-gliding trip, but Mitch has a serious accident, and ends up facing death before the fangs of a rattlesnake! Cort reacquaints himself with a woman who has a shocking secret.

programme.title: The End?
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E22, A massive earthquake destroys Baywatch headquarters and leaves Gina's life hanging in the balance. Meanwhile, Cort and Craig are trapped in the ocean. And Eddie is the only one left who can help a pregnant woman going into labor.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E01, Mitch rescues an underwater photographer that appears to have been attacked by a Sea Creature in an underwater cave, resulting in a media frenzy. Shauni rescues a young girl in the ocean then has to rescue her family from drowning.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E02, When a fishing trawler mysteriously sinks, the “Creature in the Bay” is thought responsible! Mitch, Devon and Captain Thorpe set out to prove there is more than meets the eye behind this Creature's mysterious attacks.

programme.title: The One Who Got Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E03, After Baywatch lifeguard Megan is attacked on the beach, she struggles to regain her confidence – unaware that her attacker, a fisherman, views her as the "One That Got Away." Meanwhile, Shauni suffers from lifeguard burnout.

programme.title: Money, Honey
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E04, After Mitch makes a heroic ocean rescue while working at her private beach party, a Hollywood producer offers Mitch the starring role in a movie. Meanwhile, Harvey and Shauni hold a wild bikini contest to raise money for an aquatic rescue group.

programme.title: The Fabulous Buchannon Boys
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E05, Mitch receives an unexpected visit from his free-spirited brother, whose troubled son entices Hobie to surf the pylons of a treacherous condemned pier. Meanwhile, a local vendor nearly causes a riot when his bikinis disintegrate in the water.

programme.title: Point of Attack
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E06, After helping break up a gang fight on the beach, Eddie gets the idea of having some gang members join the lifeguard W.A.T.E.R. program designed to help troubled youths.

programme.title: Sandcastles
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E07, Baywatch lifeguards gain insight into the plight of the homeless when Hobie befriends a girl who's living on the streets. Eddie is attacked by a former mental patient known as “Hector the Collector.”
